# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that acts as the delegate of the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSScrubberDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Configuring the scrubber

- **dataSource**: The object that provides the data for the scrubber.
